guidance.en: Begin by simply observing the natural breath. Notice when breaths are long or short without trying to control them. This develops basic awareness of the breathing process.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in experiencing the whole body'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out experiencing the whole body'.

guidance.en: Expand awareness to include the entire body. Feel the breath throughout the body, not just at one point. Notice subtle sensations, movements, and energy as you breathe.

pali.roman: Passambhayaс╣Б k─Бya-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, passambhayaс╣Б k─Бya-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in calming the bodily formation'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out calming the bodily formation'.

guidance.en: Allow the breath and body to become calm and tranquil. Let go of physical tension and restlessness. The breath naturally becomes finer and more subtle.

pali.roman: Passambhayaс╣Б k─Бya-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, passambhayaс╣Б k─Бya-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in tranquillising the bodily formation'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out tranquillising the bodily formation'.

guidance.en: Deepen the calmness. As the breath becomes very subtle, the body feels very light and peaceful. This prepares the mind for the next tetrad.

description.en: Awareness of pleasant, unpleasant, and neutral feelings

pali.roman: P─лti-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, p─лti-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in experiencing rapture'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out experiencing rapture'.

guidance.en: Observe any feelings of joy, interest, or rapture that arise from the calm breath. If none are present, simply be aware of the potential for joy.

pali.roman: Sukha-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, sukha-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in experiencing happiness'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out experiencing happiness'.

guidance.en: Shift focus to a more subtle, peaceful happiness or comfort. Let the excitement of rapture settle into deep contentment.

pali.roman: Citta-saс╣Еkh─Бra-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, citta-saс╣Еkh─Бra-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in experiencing the mental formation'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out experiencing the mental formation'.

guidance.en: Observe how feelings and perceptions affect the mind. Notice if they cause agitation or peace.

pali.roman: Passambhayaс╣Б citta-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, passambhayaс╣Б citta-saс╣Еkh─Бraс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in calming the mental formation'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out calming the mental formation'.

guidance.en: Calm the reactions to feelings. Let go of attachment to pleasant feelings and aversion to unpleasant ones.

pali.roman: Citta-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, citta-paс╣нisaс╣Бved─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in experiencing the mind'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out experiencing the mind'.

guidance.en: Turn awareness explicitly to the state of the mind itself. Is it lustful or not? Angry or not? Deluded or not? Constricted or scattered?

pali.roman: Abhippamodayaс╣Б cittaс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, abhippamodayaс╣Б cittaс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in gladdening the mind'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out gladdening the mind'.

guidance.en: If the mind is dull, uplift it. Bring up an inspiring image or reflection to brighten the mind.

pali.roman: Sam─Бdahaс╣Б cittaс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, sam─Бdahaс╣Б cittaс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in concentrating the mind'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out concentrating the mind'.

guidance.en: Steadily focus the mind on the breath. Let it become unified and still.

pali.roman: Vimocayaс╣Б cittaс╣Б assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, vimocayaс╣Б cittaс╣Б passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in liberating the mind'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out liberating the mind'.

guidance.en: Free the mind from any hindrances or heavy states that remain. Let go.

pali.roman: Anicc─Бnupass─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, anicc─Бnupass─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in contemplating impermanence'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out contemplating impermanence'.

guidance.en: Observe the constant rising and falling of the breath, feelings, and thoughts. See nothing lasts.

pali.roman: Vir─Бg─Бnupass─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, vir─Бg─Бnupass─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in contemplating fading away'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out contemplating fading away'.

guidance.en: Notice how things fade away and disappear. Let interest in worldly things fade.

pali.roman: Nirodh─Бnupass─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, nirodh─Бnupass─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in contemplating cessation'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out contemplating cessation'.

guidance.en: Observe the ending of phenomena. Find peace in the cessation of stress.

pali.roman: Paс╣нinissagg─Бnupass─л assasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati, paс╣нinissagg─Бnupass─л passasiss─Бm─л ti sikkhati.

translation.en: One trains thus: 'I shall breathe in contemplating relinquishment'; one trains thus: 'I shall breathe out contemplating relinquishment'.

guidance.en: Give up all holding and clinging. Return everything to nature. Rest in total freedom.
